Software Engineering - Search and Knowledge Graph

California - San Francisco, United States

Full Time Mid-level / Intermediate USD 125K - 236K

  • LinkedIn

Salesforce

Bieten Sie die beste Customer Experience mit einem einzigen CRM-Tool f√ºr Sales, Kundenservice, Marketing, Commerce & IT. Jetzt 30 Tage testen!

View all jobs at Salesforce

Apply now Apply later

Posted 14 hours ago

To get the best candidate experience, please consider applying for a maximum of 3 roles within 12 months to ensure you are not duplicating efforts.

Job Category

Software Engineering

Job Details

About Salesforce

We‚Äôre Salesforce, the Customer Company, inspiring the future of business with AI+ Data +CRM. Leading with our core values, we help companies across every industry blaze new trails and connect with customers in a whole new way. And, we empower you to be a Trailblazer, too ‚Äî driving your performance and career growth, charting new paths, and improving the state of the world. If you believe in business as the greatest platform for change and in companies doing well and doing good ‚Äì you‚Äôve come to the right place.

Salesforce is seeking a skilled and innovative Senior Member of Technical Staff to contribute to intelligent Search and Knowledge Graph solutions within our Einstein Foundation team. Are you excited to build the next-gen Generative AI platforms that empower enterprise-wide knowledge discovery, enhance AI with knowledge driven context, and enable human-like understanding of relationships through Knowledge Graphs?

As the world‚Äôs #1 AI CRM, Salesforce has introduced Agentforce, a groundbreaking suite of autonomous AI agents that transform how we achieve efficiency and customer satisfaction across service, sales, marketing, and commerce. This role focuses on hands-on development and driving technical epics to deliver ground-breaking AI driven experiences for millions of users globally.

The Team

Our Einstein Foundation team is a multidisciplinary group of machine learning engineers, data scientists, and software developers dedicated to creating adaptive, context-aware systems that redefine customer interactions. We value creativity, collaboration, and a commitment to delivering scalable AI driven solutions for customer success.

The Role

You will actively contribute to the design and development of intelligent Search and Knowledge Graph solutions, integrating innovative machine learning, LLMs, and vector databases. You‚Äôll lead technical epics, work hands-on with the development team, and ensure the scalability and reliability of our solutions. Collaborating with Product Managers, Data Scientists, and Research teams, you‚Äôll help shape the future of Salesforce‚Äôs AI experiences.

What You‚Äôll Do

  • Develop Sophisticated Search & Knowledge Graph Solutions

  • Work on building and optimizing high-performance search and retrieval solutions demonstrating Knowledge Graphs for enterprise-scale environments.

  • Contribute to Intelligent Retrieval Pipelines

  • Implement hybrid retrieval pipelines combining semantic, vector, and symbolic search to enhance relevance, speed, and accuracy.

  • Optimize and Automate Systems

  • Participate in automating capacity planning, configuration, and supervising to drive real-time optimization.

  • Lead Technical Epics

  • ¬†Take ownership of key technical epics, ensuring alignment across teams and timely delivery of high-quality solutions.

  • Collaborate Across Teams

  • Work closely with Product Managers, ML Engineers, and Knowledge Graph experts to deliver scalable, impactful AI driven solutions.

  • Drive Innovation in Search and Knowledge Graphs

  • Stay updated on emerging technologies, contributing to discussions and experimentation with vector search, graph embeddings, and knowledge-augmented retrieval.


Required Skills

  • 5+ Years in Machine Learning & Search Systems

  • Strong experience with search optimization, Knowledge Graphs, and innovative retrieval techniques.

  • Proficiency in Semantic and Vector-Based Search

  • Experience with vector databases (e.g., FAISS, Pinecone, Milvus) and ANN search algorithms to deliver high-relevance results.

  • Hands-on NLP & LLMs Expertise

  • Practical experience with NLP techniques, prompt engineering, and LLMs for enterprise-scale applications.

  • Experience with Knowledge Graphs

  • ¬†Hands-on experience with graph databases (e.g., Neo4j, Amazon Neptune) and graph embedding techniques to enhance retrieval.

  • Strong Programming and ML Framework Skills

  • ¬† Proficiency in Python and ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch) for developing scalable AI systems.


Preferred Skills

  • Experience with Retrieval Pipelines

  • Hands-on experience in building multi-stage retrieval workflows balancing precision and recall.

  • Expertise in Retrieval Optimization

  • Familiarity with re-ranking, hybrid search, and knowledge augmented retrieval techniques.

  • Graph Embedding & Contextual Search

  • Experience in implementing graph-based search and context expansion methods for deep, accurate retrieval.

  • Knowledge Graph Curation & Management

  • Knowledge of schema design, ontology management, and Knowledge Graph curation.

  • Feedback Loops and Fine-Tuning

  • Experience incorporating user feedback and relevance signals for continuous improvement.

Additional Attributes:

  • Broad experience in diverse ML techniques, adaptable for Search and Knowledge Graph use cases.

  • Strong collaboration skills with the ability to work across engineering, research, and product teams.

If you‚Äôre passionate about building cutting edge AI solutions and contributing to ground-breaking Search and Knowledge Graph systems at the world‚Äôs #1 CRM company, we‚Äôd love to meet you!

Accommodations

If you require assistance due to a disability applying for open positions please submit a request via this Accommodations Request Form.

Posting Statement

At Salesforce we believe that the business of business is to improve the state of our world. Each of us has a responsibility to drive Equality in our communities and workplaces. We are committed to creating a workforce that reflects society through inclusive programs and initiatives such as equal pay, employee resource groups, inclusive benefits, and more. Learn more about Equality at www.equality.com and explore our company benefits at www.salesforcebenefits.com.

Salesforce is an Equal Employment Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender perception or identity, national origin, age, marital status, protected veteran status, or disability status. Salesforce does not accept unsolicited headhunter and agency resumes. Salesforce will not pay any third-party agency or company that does not have a signed agreement with Salesforce.

ÔªøSalesforce welcomes all.

Pursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance and the Los Angeles Fair Chance Initiative for Hiring, Salesforce will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.

For Washington-based roles, the base salary hiring range for this position is $125,700 to $216,700.

For California-based roles, the base salary hiring range for this position is $137,100 to $236,500.

Compensation offered will be determined by factors such as location, level, job-related knowledge, skills, and experience. Certain roles may be eligible for incentive compensation, equity, benefits. More details about our company benefits can be found at the following link: https://www.salesforcebenefits.com.
